itemListElement.name: UX Fundamentals
itemListElement.description: Learn how to apply user-centered design principles to improve your website and mobile app design. A must-take course for anyone working in web design and development.

itemListElement.name: Introducing Sketch for UX and UI
itemListElement.description: Learn how to use Sketch tools and features to build an interactive prototype for a mobile website.

itemListElement.name: Advanced Rapid Prototyping with Axure
itemListElement.description: Learn how to use the conditional logic features in Axure in order to quickly create an interactive prototype.

itemListElement.name: Working with Atomic Design and Pattern Lab
itemListElement.description: Learn how to use Atomic Design methodology within Pattern Lab in order to create reusable user interface components.

itemListElement.name: Writing for Web & Mobile
itemListElement.description: Learn how to write compelling content through meaningful audience research and find the right words to attract and engage users.

itemListElement.name: Information Design and Visualization Fundamentals
itemListElement.description: Learn the design and visual principles needed to create effective information graphics and data visualizations.
